Blog Say Hello

Three rules for calcualting Hb, RBC and PCV tests

It is found that this rule is helpful only in the emergency cases and in the healthy people and do not base on it in all cases.

• Hb × 3 = PCV

• PCV / 3 = Hb

• Hb / 3 = RBC count

Written on July 17, 2020
